page.title: 09Farming Part 1
page.content: {Scotston Farm}is the main farm in our area. The owner of this mechanised farm which covers four hundred and ninety acres is{Mr.Baird.}The tractors used are{Massey Ferguson, Deutz}and a very old{Fordson Major.}They have two sheds, one of which the Bairds call the{'Big Shed'}is one hundred and fifteen feet by one hundred and forty-four. It is used for storing, potatoes, grain, bales and farm machinery such as a combine-harvester that cuts and thrashes in one operation leaving a trail of straw behind it that will be baled. Once a year a{Barn Dance}is held in the Big Shed. Some 500 dancers crowd into it from 8 pm to 1 am. All the proceeds go to the{Auchterhouse Pipe Band}who give a performance during the dance. The other shed is used to house the cattle and store the grain after drying.
